title: Anitian FedFlex Starter Pre-Audit Submission
body: We release this pre-audit [submission](https://github.com/anitianinc/anitian-fedflex-fedramp-20x) in partnership with our 3PAO, A-LIGN, to support the FedRAMP 20x focus on transparency and community collaboration. We invite feedback during this draft phase to help shape the final submission.
author: mmcveigh6
